# Stressors {#sec-stressors}

The stressor component of the vulnerability framework (see @sec-science) addresses the human activities that may impact marine ecosystems. This section is a placeholder for future phases of the MST, which will incorporate stressor-receptor interaction matrices to complete the full vulnerability assessment.

## Offshore Wind Energy

Evaluation of stressors from the offshore wind industry needs to be evaluated based on human activities given the phase of development, whether pre-construction, construction, operation or decommissioning (@fig-cum-effects).
